title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn’t specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

R cookbook for analysis with IMPACT



book

R programming

data cleaning

data analysis



This book aims to be a small collection of codes used across different missions. It contains examples of different problems you can face and offers guidance to solve them. The codes are not exhaustive but just examples. It was written collaboratively.





Aug 1, 2023


R Squad










Cookbook for CICD with R and GitHub Actions



book

CICD

bookdown

Github Actions

R programming



This is a collection of GitHub actions and how to set them with usethis(version 2.1.6) that can be found here. When I thought necessary I have added a few additional steps, e.g. when using other services from GitHub or Codecov.





May 1, 2023
